title: Cryptocurrency
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: cryptocurrency-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: BC-0097
	- preferred-term:: Cryptocurrency
	- status:: complete
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Digital currency on blockchain within blockchain systems, providing essential functionality for distributed ledger technology operations and properties.
	- source:: [[ISO/IEC 23257:2021]], [[IEEE 2418.1]], [[NIST NISTIR]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: bc:Cryptocurrency
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: bc:VirtualObject
	- belongsToDomain:: [[TokenEconomicsDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[EconomicLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: cryptocurrency-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Blockchain Entity]]
		- is-subclass-of:: [[EconomicMechanism]]

ontology.definition: Digital currency on blockchain within blockchain systems, providing essential functionality for distributed ledger technology operations and properties.
